report.title: Trending people for an event
report.description: Gives a list of top 10 recent contributors, with their number of records. Ideal for populating a 'trends cloud'.
report.query: SELECT COALESCE(default_common_name, preferred_taxon) as species, records, greatest(11, cast((15 - (sqrt(#records_to_scan#) / sqrt(records)))*2.5 as integer)) as font_size FROM ( SELECT default_common_name, preferred_taxon, count(id) as records FROM (SELECT o.id, cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #filters# ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #records_to_scan#) list GROUP BY default_common_name, preferred_taxon ORDER BY count(id) DESC LIMIT #recorders_to_return# ) AS list ORDER BY COALESCE(default_common_name, preferred_taxon) ASC
